issue.title: [Packaging][Python] macOS wheels occasionally exceed travis build time limit
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8582](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8582). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Either reduce the build time or port to another CI provider.
